name.ja: ギャラクティカ・ゴッドオブリビオン

summoning_condition.en: You can Tribute Summon this card in Attack Position by Tributing 3 monsters.

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card the above way, shuffle 5 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards on the field. Then, you can make this card gain ATK equal to [the ATK of the Normal Monster with the highest ATK in your Graveyard] until the end of this turn.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! GO RUSH!! Volume 4 promotional card
